title: Creamy Slow Cooker Green Chili Chicken Soup

instructions.1: Pour canola oil into slow cooker and tilt to coat bottom of crock. Put chicken into bottom of slow cooker.
instructions.2: Mix salt, chili powder, onion powder, garlic powder, cumin, white pepper, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl; sprinkle about half the mixture over the chicken. Turn the chicken and sprinkle remaining spice mixture over the chicken.
instructions.3: Layer tomato sauce, green chiles, pinto beans, and diced tomatoes atop the chicken, respectively.
instructions.4: Whisk chicken broth and cream of chicken soup together in a bowl; pour evenly over the diced tomato layer.
instructions.5: Cook on High for 1 hour. Stir to spread ingredients evenly throughout the soup. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, for 5 hours more.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the chicken from Step 1 being used?
Is chicken from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is chicken from Step 1 still available in Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 5?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the chicken in Step 3?
Can we pour (Step 1) and whisk (Step 4) at the same time?
